page.title: 11TRANSPORT>BUS JOURNEYS.
page.content: My bus begins its journey at Maenclochog,it travels to Clarbeston, Clarbeston Road and finally to school at Wiston picking up children on the way.It leaves Maenclochog at 8a.m,picks me up at 8.40a.m and gets into school at 9a.m. There usually 35 children on the bus and our driver is Mrs.Williams.After school at 3.15p.m the bus arrives to take us home.I get home at 3.30p.m. STUART-My bus comes from Login. Its first stop is at Robeston Wathen at 8.55a.m.It then stops at the Bush Inn via Canaston Bridge,from there it goes to Ridgeway House and into Llawhaden where it picks me up.My journey takes 15min.and I arrive in school at 9a.m.On the way to school we stop at Wiston Grange opposite Colby Moor the site of a battle in the Civil War. BY CHRISTOPHER THOMAS+STUART NARBETT.
